name: MechaShiba
description:
MECHASHIBA is planning to take over this DeFi space with clean codes, merchandise & NFT’s and gamification.

MechaShiba’s future plans are broken down into MechArt , an NFT incubator and NFT & merchandise marketplace.

Secondly, MechAid where MechaShiba aims to aid in donations to animal shelters and other good causes. 

And finally, our very own MechaShiba Application on with integrated NFT marketplace and in game purchases utilising MechaShiba Tokens to begin our gamification journey.
